text: The 4EU+ Alliance is an association of seven European universities. == Members == The members of 4EU+ Alliance are: * Charles University (Prague) * Heidelberg University * Sorbonne University (Paris) * Paris-Panthéon-Assas University * University of Copenhagen * University of Milan * University of Warsaw * University of Geneva == History == The alliance was started in 2017 by Charles University, with Heidelberg University, Sorbonne University and University of Warsaw. It was officially founded on March 10, 2018 with a joint declaration in Paris. The University of Copenhagen and University of Milan joined in October 2018. The University of Geneva joined in August 2022. Paris- Panthéon-Assas University joined in 2023. == References == Category:Colleges and universities in Europe Category:2017 establishments in Europe
title: 4EU+ Alliance
